mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING WHERE FTYPE='MONEY' AND FSTATUS != 'END' AND FSTATUS != 'YET' AND FSTATUS != 'GOAL'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE,FVALUE, FSTARTDATE, FENDDATE, FCONTENT,FVALUETYPE, FSTATUS, MNICK, MFUNDTYPE, MADDRESS FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,FNO, FTITLE, FVALUE, FSTARTDATE, FENDDATE, FCONTENT,FVALUETYPE, FSTATUS, MNICK, MFUNDTYPE, MADDRESS FROM (SELECT F.FNO, F.FTITLE, F.FVALUE, F.FSTARTDATE, F.FENDDATE, F.FCONTENT,F.FVALUETYPE, F.FSTATUS, M.MNICK, M.MFUNDTYPE, M.MADDRESS FROM FUNDING F JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MNO = F.FWRITER) WHERE F.FTYPE='MONEY' AND F.FSTATUS != 'END' AND F.FSTATUS != 'YET' AND F.FSTATUS != 'GOAL' )) ORDER BY FNO DESC
SELECT * FROM FUNDING F JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MNO = F.FWRITER) WHERE F.FNO = #{fno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING WHERE FTYPE='ITEM' AND FSTATUS != 'END' AND FSTATUS != 'YET' AND FSTATUS != 'GOAL'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE , FCONTENT , FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE, FSTATUS , FWRITER, MNICK , MADDRESS, MFUNDTYPE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE , FCONTENT , FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE, FSTATUS , FWRITER, MNICK , MADDRESS, MFUNDTYPE FROM (SELECT FNO, FTITLE , FCONTENT , FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE, FSTATUS , FWRITER, MNICK , MADDRESS, MFUNDTYPE FROM FUNDING F , MEMBER M WHERE M.MNO = F.FWRITER AND F.FTYPE='ITEM' AND F.FSTATUS != 'END' AND F.FSTATUS != 'YET' AND F.FSTATUS != 'GOAL' ORDER BY F.FNO DESC))

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,FNO,INAME, FDVALUE, FD_INO FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,FNO,INAME, FDVALUE, FD_INO FROM (SELECT F.FNO,FI.INAME, FD.FDVALUE, FD.FD_INO FROM FUNDING F , MEMBER M , FUNDITEM FI, FUNDINGDETAIL FD WHERE M.MNO = F.FWRITER AND FD.FD_INO = FI.INO AND F.FNO = FD.FD_FNO AND F.FTYPE = 'ITEM' AND F.FSTATUS != 'END' AND F.FSTATUS != 'YET' AND F.FSTATUS != 'GOAL' ORDER BY F.FNO DESC))

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE , FCONTENT , FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE, FSTATUS , FWRITER, MNICK , MADDRESS, MFUNDTYPE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE , FCONTENT , FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE, FSTATUS , FWRITER, MNICK , MADDRESS, MFUNDTYPE FROM (SELECT FNO, FTITLE , FCONTENT , FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE, FSTATUS , FWRITER, MNICK , MADDRESS, MFUNDTYPE FROM FUNDING F , MEMBER M WHERE M.MNO = F.FWRITER AND F.FTYPE='ITEM' AND F.FSTATUS != 'YET' AND F.FNO = #{fno}))

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,FNO,INAME, FDVALUE, FD_INO FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,FNO,INAME, FDVALUE, FD_INO FROM (SELECT F.FNO,FI.INAME, FD.FDVALUE, FD.FD_INO FROM FUNDING F , MEMBER M , FUNDITEM FI, FUNDINGDETAIL FD WHERE M.MNO = F.FWRITER AND FD.FD_INO = FI.INO AND F.FNO = FD.FD_FNO AND F.FTYPE = 'ITEM' AND F.FSTATUS != 'YET' AND F.FNO = #{fno} ORDER BY F.FNO))

SELECT FNO, SUM(FDVALUE), SUM(FHDITEMVALUE) AS SUMVALUE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FNO, FDNO, FDVALUE, INO, INAME, IPRICE, FHDITEMVALUE FROM FUNDINGDETAIL FD JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON (FD.FD_INO = FI.INO ) JOIN FUNDHISTORY FH ON (FH.FH_FNO = FD.FD_FNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN FUNDHISTORYDETAIL FHD ON (FHD.FHD_INO = FD.FD_INO AND FHD.FHD_FHNO = FH.FHNO) JOIN FUNDING F ON (F.FNO = FD.FD_FNO ) WHERE FNO = #{fno}) GROUP BY FNO

SELECT FNO, SUM(FDVALUE), SUM(FHDITEMVALUE) AS SUMVALUE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FNO, FDNO, FDVALUE, INO, INAME, IPRICE, FHDITEMVALUE FROM FUNDINGDETAIL FD JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON (FD.FD_INO = FI.INO ) JOIN FUNDHISTORY FH ON (FH.FH_FNO = FD.FD_FNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN FUNDHISTORYDETAIL FHD ON (FHD.FHD_INO = FD.FD_INO AND FHD.FHD_FHNO = FH.FHNO) JOIN FUNDING F ON (F.FNO = FD.FD_FNO ) WHERE F.FSTATUS != 'END' AND F.FSTATUS != 'GOAL' AND F.FSTATUS != 'YET' ) GROUP BY FNO ORDER BY FNO DESC

SELECT SUM(FH.FHVALUE),F.FNO FROM FUNDHISTORY FH JOIN FUNDING F ON(F.FNO = FH.FH_FNO) WHERE F.FTYPE = 'MONEY' AND F.FSTATUS != 'END' AND F.FSTATUS != 'GOAL' AND F.FSTATUS != 'YET' GROUP BY F.FNO ORDER BY F.FNO DESC

SELECT FH.FHVALUE , ME.MNICK, F.FVALUETYPE FROM FUNDHISTORY FH LEFT JOIN FUNDING F ON (FH.FH_FNO = F.FNO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO = FH.FH_FNO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER ME ON(FH.FH_MNO_GIVE = ME.MNO) WHERE F.FNO = #{fno}
SELECT DHVALUE , DHVALUETYPE, DH_MNO_GIVE ,ME.MNICK FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO = DH.DH_MNO_TAKE) LEFT JOIN MEMBER ME ON(DH_MNO_GIVE = ME.MNO) WHERE M.MNO = #{mno}
